data.name: Raifu Wars - Krag Character
data.detailed_description:
Unlock Krag as a new playable character in Raifu Wars! Her skills allow her to speed through obstacles and even cross water tiles, but don't get caught out on the open water!

Features an all-new character with art, music, and voice acting.
data.about_the_game:
Unlock Krag as a new playable character in Raifu Wars! Her skills allow her to speed through obstacles and even cross water tiles, but don't get caught out on the open water!

Features an all-new character with art, music, and voice acting.
data.short_description: Unlock Krag as a new playable character in Raifu Wars!
data.supported_languages: English, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Simplified Chinese, French, Italian, Polish, Portuguese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 64-bit x86 CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4-compliant graphics
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Designed for at least 1280 x 720 screen resolution
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mavericks (OSX 10.9)
  • Processor: Intel chipset
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4-compliant graphics
  • Additional Notes: Designed for at least 1280 x 720 screen resolution
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu/Linux Mint/Debian
  • Processor: 64-bit x86 CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4-compliant graphics
  • Additional Notes: Designed for at least 1280 x 720 screen resolution
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
